func.svm

Class Kernel

  • java.lang.Object
    • func.svm.Kernel
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    LinearKernel, PolynomialKernel, RBFKernel, SigmoidKernel

    public abstract class Kernel
extends java.lang.Object
    A kernel function for a support vector machine
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Andrew Guillory gtg008g@mail.gatech.edu

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Kernel()

      Kernel(DataSet examples)
